Naruto uses his Naruto Uzumaki Combo, kicking the enemy while creating several airborne clones that kick the enemy to the ground. Naruto jumps onto a clone that charges a Rasengan that Naruto uses on the enemy while falling.

[[es:Combo Espiral de Uzumaki Naruto]]
